name: Erable째
description: Erable째 is a decentralized platform that empowers foundations, investors, and mission-driven organizations to fund and track the development of impactful Web3 projects. Through a transparent and verifiable system, Erable째 enables users to follow the use of funds via structured roadmaps, milestone-based tracking, and documentation upload (e.g. invoices, reports). The platform also includes an RWA (Real World Assets) aggregator, showcasing a curated list of projects contributing to environmental, social, and governance goals. By combining blockchain technology with impact investing principles, Erable째 offers a structured and secure environment to allocate resources, monitor progress, and drive positive change across ecosystems.
